channel.title: [508]Death..then can't move or click anything?
channel.description:
So, when we die, we get this white screen that fades in, and then we teleport to varrock, but we cannot move or cannot interact with buttons, is there a way to fix this?
This is the drowning 508 source by the way.

item.title: [508]Death..then can't move or click anything?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

After teleporting them, clear the interface. This should allow the player to move.

Read full topic

item.title: [508]Death..then can't move or click anything?
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

I have no idea but since no one else replied, I’d recommend you search these files first for the interface that sends.

Frames.java
or
Player.java

If you have those files, (player’s I’m sure you do), search in there for the message that appears when you die, if you take a screenie and post it I coule probally help you better…

Read full topic
